condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :ACGF Agreement | Description :The Government of Afghanistan (Ministry of Finance) shall enter into a partnershipagreement with the Afghanistan Credit Guarantee Foundation (ACGF) under terms and conditions approved by the Association. | DueDate :15-Jan-2016

Finance Agreement :Safeguards | Description :The Government of Afghanistan, through Ministry of Finance shall, and shall cause DEG,ACGF and MISFA, to carry out the Project in accordance with the ESMF, including the screening and mitigation measures set forththerein, in a manner satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

title.narrative: Number of active loan accounts - SME (ACGF)
